decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo by using Saheeli Rai's -2 ability to copy Felidar Guardian's enter the battlefield ability, allowing you to create an infinite loop of Felidar Guardian entering and leaving the battlefield. This combo can generate an arbitrarily large number of Felidar Guardians, creating a formidable army of 1/4 creatures. By including cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Rogue Refiner for additional value, this deck aims to overwhelm and outpace the opponent with its powerful combo potential.

The deck revolves around creating infinite copies of Felidar Guardian using Saheeli Rai's -2 ability. By flickering the Guardian with cards like Essence Flux or using Chandra's -3 ability, players can generate an unlimited number of copies to overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing cards such as Oath of Nissa and Attune with Aether helps to filter through the deck and find the necessary combo pieces. The deck also includes other powerful cards like Rogue Refiner and Whirler Virtuoso to provide additional value and support the combo win condition.

This Combo - CopyCat deck focuses on assembling the Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian combo to create infinite token copies of Felidar Guardians. The deck includes cards such as Harnessed Lightning and Negate for removal and protection, Servant of the Conduit for mana ramp, and Chandra, Torch of Defiance for card advantage. By utilizing the CopyCat combo, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a large army of tokens and powerful planeswalkers, ultimately leading to victory through sheer card advantage and board presence.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing +1/+1 counters and efficient removal spells to overwhelm opponents quickly. By combining creatures like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade with powerful finishers like Verdurous Gearhulk, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and keep them on the back foot. Utilizing a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness, as well as versatile creatures like Walking Ballista, this deck aims to control the board while establishing a threatening board presence.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and efficient removal spells. By playing cards like Walking Ballista, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Winding Constrictor, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and maintain momentum throughout the game. Additionally, cards like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness provide removal options to deal with opposing threats. The deck also includes cards like Tireless Tracker and Grim Flayer to generate card advantage and provide additional threats. Overall, the strategy is to establish a strong board presence and win through aggression.

The key concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Walking Ballista and Verdurous Gearhulk, supported by cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to pump them up. The deck also includes removal spells like Murder, Grasp of Darkness, and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats, while cards like Aethersphere Harvester and Glint-Sleeve Siphoner provide additional value and card advantage. Gonti, Lord of Luxury and Tireless Tracker offer further utility and flexibility in different matchups.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to apply constant pressure on the opponent through a combination of efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness, along with powerful creature threats like Walking Ballista, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Mindwrack Demon. The deck also utilizes cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to grow its creatures quickly and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Traverse the Ulvenwald and Grim Flayer helps maintain card advantage and consistency throughout the game.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk to quickly overwhelm the opponent. With support cards like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness for removal and Glint-Sleeve Siphoner for card draw, the deck aims to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. Additional mana ramp from Servant of the Conduit allows for strong early plays, while Aethersphere Harvester provides both evasion and lifegain. Gonti, Lord of Luxury adds disruption by stealing cards from the opponent's deck.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently deploy threats onto the battlefield, leveraging the synergy between +1/+1 counters and creatures. Cards like Winding Constrictor, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Rishkar, Peema Renegade help to boost the power of the creatures on the board, while removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness help to clear the way for attacks. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Grim Flayer and Tireless Tracker to maintain momentum throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to maintain an aggressive playstyle by utilizing a combination of powerful artifacts and creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By focusing on early-game aggression and tempo, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure with creatures like Scrapheap Scrounger and Toolcraft Exemplar while also utilizing removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration to control the battlefield. Cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Aethersphere Harvester provide additional support and evasion, allowing the deck to maintain pressure and close out games efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to establish a fast and aggressive board presence by playing efficient creatures and vehicles, while also having access to removal spells to deal with opponent's threats. The deck aims to curve out smoothly with low-cost creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Inventor's Apprentice, while also utilizing powerful synergy with cards like Heart of Kiran and Veteran Motorist. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional support and buffs for the team, helping to close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures and vehicles to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes cards like Toolcraft Exemplar, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Heart of Kiran for early damage. With a mix of powerful creatures like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration, the goal is to maintain pressure while controlling the board. The inclusion of vehicles like Cultivator's Caravan and Depala, Pilot Exemplar further enhances the aggro strategy by providing additional threats and versatility in combat.

The deck focuses on playing powerful energy-generating cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to ramp up to playing Aetherworks Marvel. This allows the player to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and World Breaker early in the game. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Kozilek's Return to control the board while using Chandra, Torch of Defiance for additional card advantage and burn damage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats and card advantage generated by the Marvelous Energy combo.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through countering opponents' spells, removal, and card draw, while utilizing Dynavolt Tower to deal damage to the opponent. The deck aims to generate energy through cards like Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning to power up the tower and use it as a win condition. Torrential Gearhulk is included for additional control and value, while the rest of the creatures and spells provide card advantage and board presence. The mana base is set up to ensure consistent casting of spells and activating Dynavolt Tower.
